title: mangaLalaya maamava
sahitya:
Mangalaalaya mamava Deva

Pankajaasana Bhaavitha Bhaava



anupallavi



Devaki Vasudeva Varadhanooja

Divya kireeta dhalitha bhava peeja

Sarva Yogi visindhya padhaabja

Sankhadhaaseha Saadhu samaaja



caraNam 1



Aparimithaananda Bodha swaroopa

Athikarunaa Vidhruthaathpuda roopa

Kapata Raakshasa hara kanditha paapa

Kanakaambharadhara kapata thuraapa



caraNam 2



Makara Kundala Keyooraadhu vibhoosha

Manasija shatha koti Manjoona vesha

Vikasa Kamaladhala shatru Chaayaadaaksha

Vimala Gokula Gopalakila Raksha



caraNam 3



Kalitha Sri Kausthubha Kamaneeya Kanta

Karunaarasabhara militha vaikunta

Paripaalaya Bhoori bhaagya vitharana

Guru Bhaktha siva Naaraayan theertha Charana
